original_title: The Half-Life of Genius Physicist Raemer Schreiber
overview: Our two-hour film highlights the life and career of Dr. Schreiber with respect and clarity. Raemer, his wife Marge, and young daughter Paula would move to the high-desert of New Mexico where he and other brilliant minds would change the world forever.
title: The Half-Life of Genius Physicist Raemer Schreiber
